room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: So much fun! You will not be disappointed. Will definitely be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: We did this for our family fun night out. With 3 teenagers who all have different likes it's always a challenge to find something everyone enjoys but this hit the spot for sure. Thanks for a great time. We will be back soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: Great family time today.... trying to escape from the new Lost Antidote room. Thanks for a great experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: My husband and I went with a group of friends. We all had a great time & found the experience challenging & unique!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: We took our 6 kids (6 thru 14) and had a blast! We solved it in about 30 minutes and each of us played a role in escaping, even the youngest! Team building and problem solving skills were strengthened today! We already have plans to do another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: So much fun!!!! The guys who work there and design rooms are super nice and funny. I can't wait to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Antidote" by The Escape OKC in Oklahoma City
review: My wife and I came with our best friends to celebrate my birthday and we had an absolute blast. We escaped with about 10 minutes to spare, it's a 3 hour drive, but we can't wait to come back and conquer another room!
